functional_jobs.job_statement: When I am browsing for new events, I want to easily identify which events are new and their details, so I can make informed decisions about which ones to attend.
functional_jobs.current_solution: Using the app and website to check for new events.
functional_jobs.pain_points: The information on new events is confusing, and it's hard to know which events are new without additional clarity. The website and app are not well integrated, causing further confusion.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: Clear visibility of new events with easy access to details like timing and pricing before clicking into each event.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: I can quickly see all new events listed in a user-friendly manner, including their prices, so I can decide without confusion.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When I am looking for events, I want to feel confident and informed, so I can enjoy the process of planning my activities.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: Using the app to check for new events.
emotional_jobs.pain_points: Feeling overwhelmed by the current layout and lack of clear information leads to frustration.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A sense of ease and confidence when searching for events, knowing I have all the information I need at my fingertips.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: I feel relaxed and in control while planning my attendance for events.

social_jobs.job_statement: When I attend events, I want to be seen as someone who is well-informed and organized, so I can enhance my social reputation.
social_jobs.current_solution: Sharing event attendance with friends and discussing upcoming events.
social_jobs.pain_points: Not having enough information to confidently discuss the events or recommend them to others.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: Being perceived as knowledgeable and engaged with the community's events.
social_jobs.success_criteria: Others view me as the go-to person for event recommendations and information.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When I am managing my events, I want to save my payment information, so I can make quick purchases without hassle.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Storing credit card information in the app and website.
supporting_jobs.pain_points: The need to enter credit card information repeatedly can be a barrier to quick purchases.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: Seamless transactions that allow me to quickly buy tickets or register for events.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: I can complete purchases without having to re-enter my payment details every time.
